Author: howunfortunate_
Text: well... my very obese parents live with me... i constantly have to remind myself that i don't need to starve myself to avoid being like them (not even physically, just like, psychologically). i just try to avoid looking at their plates while they eat and gently ask them to please not comment on my food. obviously a bit hard to do if they don't know about your ED but mine do and they often stop nagging after a while.
